nodes.text: Graham Haley was born in Africa. After numerous years odd-jobbing, Graham began acting in theater, radio, film, and television. He immigrated to Canada in 1978, where he founded The Comedy Bank. This association led him all the way to a comedy series on Canadian radio. Graham is best known for his TV show Haley's Hints. Since its launch, the show has expanded from Canada to the United States to South America to Europe to Asia, and to Africa. He recorded the guide track for C-3PO on the Star Wars Droids series.
He currently lives in Toronto with his wife Rosemary and daughters Erin, Kerry, and Anna. He spends time outside of the Haley's Hints performing voice-overs for TV and radio commercials.
